metadata.title: Best Loom Alternatives 2025: Screen Recording Tools
metadata.description: Looking for a Loom alternative? Compare screen recording tools for tutorials and async communication.

hero.headline: Best Loom Alternatives
hero.subheadline: Screen recording and async video beyond Loom. More features, different pricing.

sections.content: Loom popularized quick screen recordings for async communication. But its pricing has increased, and alternatives have matured. Whether you need more editing, longer recordings, or just better value, here are the best Loom alternatives.

content.title: ScreenPal (Screencast-O-Matic)
content.description: Established player, good free tier. More editing than Loom.

content.title: OBS Studio
content.description: Free, powerful. More complex but unlimited capability.

faq.question: Best free Loom alternative?
faq.answer: OBS Studio for power users. ScreenPal free tier for simpler needs. Built-in tools (Windows Xbox Bar, Mac Screenshot) work for basics.

faq.question: Which has best editing?
faq.answer: ScreenPal has solid editing built in. Tella.tv produces beautiful output. OBS is raw recording—need separate editor.

faq.question: Best for teams?
faq.answer: Loom still strong for teams. Vimeo Record integrates with Vimeo hosting. CloudApp (Zight) good for quick team sharing.

faq.question: Can I self-host recordings?
faq.answer: OBS recordings are local files—host anywhere. Most cloud services require their hosting. Some enterprise plans offer custom hosting.
